summary: MY PASSENGER AIRBAG LIGHT KEPT COMING ON.  I CHECKED WITH THE DEALER AND WAS TOLD THAT WHEN PARTS CAME IN I WOULD BE NOTIFIED.  II RECEIVED NOTICE OF THE TAKATA RECALL IN JUNE 2016 BUT HAVE NOT RECEIVED ANY CALLS FROM THE DEALER OR FORD MOTOR COMPANY FOR THE RESOLUTION OF THIS PROBLEM.  I WROTE TO THE FORD COMPANY ON 11/2/16, BUT AS TO THIS DATE HAVE NOT RECEIVED ANY REPLY.
